seriesJson.title: The LaSalle String Quartet II
seriesJson.description: This series presents performances by the La Salle Quartet of Cincinnati, Ohio.

node.title: Schoenberg and Schumann, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of three parts, features performances of Schoenberg: Quartet No. 3; Schumann: Quintet for Piano and String Quartet.

node.title: Schoenberg and Schumann, part 3
node.description: This program, the third of three parts, features performances of Schoenberg: Quartet No. 3; Schumann: Quintet for Piano and String Quartet.

node.title: Schoenberg and Schumann, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of three parts, features performances of Schoenberg: Quartet No. 3; Schumann: Quintet for Piano and String Quartet.

node.title: Vivaldi, Webern, and Beethoven, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of three parts, features performances of Vivaldi: Sonata a Quattro; Webern: Five Movements, Op. 5; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 59, No. 1.

node.title: Vivaldi, Webern, and Beethoven, part 3
node.description: This program, the third of three parts, features performances of Vivaldi: Sonata a Quattro; Webern: Five Movements, Op. 5; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 59, No. 1.

node.title: Vivaldi, Webern, and Beethoven, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of three parts, features performances of Vivaldi: Sonata a Quattro; Webern: Five Movements, Op. 5; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 59, No. 1.

node.title: Matyas Seiber and Beethoven, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of three parts, features performances of Matyas Seiber: Quartet No. 2; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 132, No. 5.

node.title: Matyas Seiber and Beethoven, part 3
node.description: This program, the third of three parts, features performances of Matyas Seiber: Quartet No. 2; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 132, No. 5.

node.title: Matyas Seiber and Beethoven, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of three parts, features performances of Matyas Seiber: Quartet No. 2; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 132, No. 5.

node.title: Mozart, G.M. Koenig, and Dvorak, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, features performances of Mozart: Quartet in D minor; G.M. Koenig: Quartet #1; Dvorak: "American" Quartet.

node.title: Mozart, G.M. Koenig, and Dvorak, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of two parts, features performances of Mozart: Quartet in D minor; G.M. Koenig: Quartet #1; Dvorak: "American" Quartet.

node.title: Haydn, Franco Evangelist, and Brahms, part 3
node.description: This program, the third of three parts, features performances of Haydn: Quartet, Op. 75, No. 1; Franco Evangelist: Aleatorio in Two Versions; Brahms: Quartet in A minor.

node.title: Haydn, Franco Evangelist, and Brahms, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of three parts, features performances of Haydn: Quartet, Op. 75, No. 1; Franco Evangelist: Aleatorio in Two Versions; Brahms: Quartet in A minor.

node.title: Haydn, Franco Evangelist, and Brahms, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of three parts, features performances of Haydn: Quartet, Op. 75, No. 1; Franco Evangelist: Aleatorio in Two Versions; Brahms: Quartet in A minor.

node.title: Bartok, Beethoven, and Stravinsky, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, features performances of Bartok: Quartet No. 2; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 18, No. 3; Stravinsky: Concertino

node.title: Bartok, Beethoven, and Stravinsky, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of two parts, features performances of Bartok: Quartet No. 2; Beethoven: Quartet, Op. 18, No. 3; Stravinsky: Concertino
